tool_description: it's a free API for FinTech education
name: finance-api-for-edu
title: finance-api-for-edu

api_list.name: fb getData
api_list.description: get Facebook data it's just example for education purpose only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finance-api-for-edu.p.rapidapi.com/fb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finance-api-for-edu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
